dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position.

dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's huge. And their e-commerce platform is the second largest in Kazakhstan, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's a massive jump. And the numbers for this year are just wild—2.4 million online purchases, up 140% from last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a massive jump. And the numbers for this year are just wildminus two point four million online purchases, up one hundred forty percent from last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the value of those purchases grew by 115%. It's clear the pandemic really accelerated their growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the value of those purchases grew by one hundred fifteen percent. It's clear the pandemic really accelerated their growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The amount of purchases grew 125%, the number of purchases by 150% compared to last year.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And it's not just small retailers—they're working with big names like Adidas, Nike, Marks & Spencer…

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so they're supporting both international and domestic businesses. Helping them retain jobs, which is pretty crucial right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And you know, Forbes Kazakhstan ranks them annually with Ernst & Young—so it's a legit recognition of their impact.

dialogue_turns.text: And seamless integration seems key—like everything's in one app, which users obviously love.
